summary: This document is an email chain among US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) personnel discussing scheduling a meeting regarding 'Epstein FOIA Next Steps - Noel Team'. The emails show coordination to find a suitable time for a meeting, with references to a proffer and availability windows.

events.title: Scheduling of Epstein FOIA Meeting
events.description: Email chain among USANYS personnel to schedule a meeting titled 'Epstein FOIA Next Steps - Noel Team', with proposed times including the afternoon of April 13 or morning of April 14.

keyFacts: The document is an internal email chain within the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS).
The subject is 'Epstein FOIA Next Steps - Noel Team', indicating ongoing FOIA-related work on the Epstein case by a team named 'Noel'.
A meeting was being scheduled for either April 13, 2021 (4:00-4:30 PM ET or 6:00 PM) or the morning of April 14, 2021.
All personal names and email addresses are redacted, shown as '(USANYS)' placeholders.
The email chain includes a brief mention 'Have a proffer then, sorry', suggesting a proffer session may have conflicted with the proposed meeting time.
